page.title: 13RECREATION IN CRANHAM
page.content:
There are 3 main outdoor{RECREATION {PARKS}in our area.They are Hall Lane Playing Fields,Upminster Park and Clockhouse Park.In these parks you can play football,tennis,cricket,hockey and bowls.There is also a golf club and a public pitch and putt course.
{INDOOR SPORTS}are centered on Hall Mead and Coopers schools where sports activites are used extensively by the evening clubs and evening classes. Badmington and Keep-fit are especially popular.
Local clubs at surrounding schools and church halls cater for tabble-tennis, snooker,darts,aerobics,ballet,tap, disco and Scottish dancing, and gymnastics.
